ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 03/11/2020 12:00 PM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Shortness of breath. COMPARISON: XR CHEST 2V AP/PA AND LAT 02/16/2020 1:09 PM. TECHNIQUE: 2 views. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is a new patchy opacity in the right lower lobe. The left lung is clear. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Mediastinum: Heart and mediastinal contours are unremarkable. Other: The osseous elements are intact. IMPRESSION: New patchy opacity in the right lower lobe, suspicious for pneumonia.
